name: The Mirrors, the Maze, and the Tsar
desc: You discover a deep pit near the Frostmoon Enclave...

value.text: The Mirrors, the Maze, and the Tsar

customize.text:
Enter the huge hole into <color=#ece5d8>Crab Tsar's Palace</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Location -</color> <color=#ece5d8>Hiisi Island, Nod-Krai</color>
The player can teleport to the nearest waypoint.

Entering the hole will start the quest automatically.
Quest Objective: Talk to Maite
Quest Objective: Advance deeper into the cave
Quest Objective: Catch up to the Crab Tsar
The first objective auto-completes after the dialogue that starts when the player enters the hole.
Go to the location inside the cave.
Grab the fragment and put it on the required spot.
The crab behind the player brings the fragment to them.
Interact with it to grab it.
Place the fragment on the blockage (if the player is at a distance and the interaction doesnâ€™t appear, they can use Kuuhenki by interacting with the plant affected by Kuuvahki.
Keep going deeper into the cave.

Quest Objective: Destroy the obstacle(s)
Place

customize.name: Lakkaberry
customize.desc:
A fruit as white as pearl that tastes refreshingly sweet.
In the legends of the Frostmoon Scions, these fruits, like kuuhenki, are a gift from the Moon Maiden, a sacred symbol blessed by the new moon. Therefore, sharing and eating delicious Lakkaberries is also a form of worshipping Kuutar.
Even when not associated with the divine, their plumpness and sweetness alone are enough to awaken one's appetite.

customize.text:
x1.
Lakkaberries are present in the cave.
Having at least 1 in the inventory, the player can interact with the obstacle to place the Lakkaberry there for the crab. The crab will then remove the obstacle.

Quest Objective: Advance deeper into the cave
Quest Objective: Destroy the obstacle(s)
Go deeper into the cave.
Interact with the obstacle in Empowered State.
Go where the obstacle is (using the bottom path is more straightforward because the top path is blocked and would also need to be opened).
Go to the nearby plants affected by Kuuvahki to enter Empowered State
Interact with the obstacle.
Go near the obstacle and place Lakkaberry x1

Quest Objective: Advance deeper into the cave
Quest Objective: Search for traces of the Crab Tsar
Quest Objective: Advance deeper into the cave
Quest Objective: Talk to Maite
Go to the objective location(s).
When the Moon Mirror appears, stand near it and look at it.
Head to the objective location.
Using Moonlane and using the Kuuvahki whenever it is available.

Quest Objective: Calm the Crab Tsar down
Quest Objective: Talk to Maite
Go to the Crab Tsar and dodge its attacks.
When the player goes to the Crab Tsar, it will trap them inside.
The player will need to avoid the attack indicator areas to not take damage.
Lure the Crab Tsar out using stone fragments.
Use the Kuuvahki whenever it appears to break pillars.
When an interactable fragment appears, grab it and then interact with the Crab Tsar to lure it out of the Moon Mirror it will be in.

<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Enter the huge hole into <color=#ece5d8>Crab Tsar's Palace</color> <color=#ffffff73>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: Polkka Beneath the Moon's Oracle
customize.desc: Explore Hiisi Island and uncover the fragments scattered across the island.

customize.name: For a Green Island...
customize.desc: You discover an island affected by kuuvahki turbulence near Hiisi Island...

customize.name: The Tale of the Gate Stone
customize.desc: In the center of the Frostmoon Enclave, you discover a strange large stone...

customize.name: Gift of the Mirage
customize.desc: On Hiisi Island, the angler Pekkani finds himself puzzled by an unseen force disturbing his catch...

customize.name: The Mirrors, the Maze, and the Tsar
customize.desc: You discover a deep pit near the Frostmoon Enclave...

customize.name: Echoes of an Unfinished Past
customize.desc: You run into Vernadska, the self-proclaimed priestess, again on Hiisi Island. This time, she's trying to get into a sanctum...

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Maite's IOU
customize.desc:
An IOU note from Maite.
According to her, this can be redeemed for a free meal at the "Speranza" restaurant in Nasha Town...

customize.name: Maite's Notes
customize.desc:
Notes written on pages printed with a conch pattern.
These are observation notes written by Maite about the Crab Tsar before it became influenced by kuuvahki. They contain a great deal of unverified speculation about brachyuran society.
